title: PoE Tracker
desc: Showcases some of my abilities to integrate different graphing libraries and APIs within my backbone web application. Updates every hour. Source on Github
tech: D3js, Highcharts, RestFul APIs, RDS on Amazon webservices

title: HotFreshGames
desc: Showcase website for some recent game development I've been working on with Troy and Dave. Includes a download link to the exciting new BlokDodge Alpha!

title: Poyo
desc: The story is of little bird named Poyo who must restore color to a desolated world. 2D Physics-based platformer created in Unity.

title: In Other Words
desc: A phrase translation web application with a user generated database. Contribute today!

title: WordPress
desc: I am currently hosting WordPress Blogs with Amazon Web Services.
tech: EC2 Micro Instances, S3 Bucket, Route53

title: FangChat
desc: Instant browser chat. Utilizes Firebase on the backend and Angular for instant communication between devices and browsers.

title: Agar.io Clone
desc: Recreated an open source multiplayer browser game on Amazon Web Servers using an EC2 Micro Instance as the server and logic controller.This project is currently offline as of 11.17.16 due to the costs of running a t2 micro.

title: This Website!
desc: This website is both my online portfolio and a constantly changing labor of love. It was previously an Angular-based application...but is now using BackboneJS &amp RequireJS :D
tech: AWS CLI,  Javascript, BackboneJS, RequireJS,S3 Buckets, Github
